channel.title: What do YOU want in a private server? The PLAYERS view! Post!
channel.description:
hi im currently making the sequel to Raplezscape v1, Servious Scape. And i dont want to just add anything that i think of, i want YOUR ideas as the players of the server, what do you want and need? Whats more popular than the rest? What do u seek in a private server? Well im gonna try me best to add what you guys like (Posters of ideas will be availible to beta testing(hamachi <--- Not forwarded yet). I will post a list of ideas underneath updating it every now and then also will be updating my progress, thanks. fuck me... 100 errors and i dont even remember what i did.... fuck...
[center][color=blue]IDEAS:
- None (0% Complete)
What I Am Working On:
- Throwing Weapons (80% Complete, Thinking of way to delete 1 of weapon, Rest Done) <--- On Pause - New Training Area (90%, Bascily Done)
What I Have Done:
- Farcasting To Bows - Walk through desert to change to ancient spells - Added 2 desert camps with fully walking NPC's - Karils Uses Kbolts - Perfect dummies, trains exactly like monsters. (Adding max skill to train 20) - Scorpians in Al-Kharid - Al-Kharid palace fully walking 'Al-Kharid Warriors' - Crystal Bow Minigame Complete (Aggressive Monsters!) - Range Bonus Decides On HitDiff With Bows!!!!! - Perfect Eating! (NO GLITCHES!) - Making Teleports Random Coords - Added Ghostly Robes Minigame( Hide and Seek! <-- Lol ) - Tele to shanty, then walk to pyramid for ancients. - And much much more.
Currently online.
Well i am currently coding but if you would like a sneek peek at what i am doing <--- MAJOR GOODNESS! I will host it on a hamachi server.... Not no-ip because i cbf port forwarding just got new routers... 3 of them lol. Also if i host hamachi mabe less people will play xD. COME AND TRY IT OUT! :P Also ill be happy to give u admin or w/e for beta testing seeing im like restarting basicly from scratch and there isnt much. Only for testing tho Hamachi Network: Beta Test SS Hamachi Password: I disabled password but if u need its - 123

item.title: What do YOU want in a private server? The PLAYERS view! Post!
item.dc:creator: @Ancient_Maul Ancient Maul
item.description:
@Ancient_Maul wrote:

this is the compiler most people use:

@echo off title COMPILE if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

It Auto finds the JDK you have.

Read full topic
